commits.author: Yonik Seeley
commits.sourceNew:
public void testLuke() {
    doTestHistogramPowerOfTwoBucket();

    assertU(adoc("id","SOLR1000", "name","Apache Solr",
      "solr_si", "10",
      "solr_sl", "10",
      "solr_sf", "10",
      "solr_sd", "10",
      "solr_s", "10",
      "solr_sI", "10",
      "solr_sS", "10",
      "solr_t", "10",
      "solr_tt", "10",
      "solr_b", "true",
      "solr_i", "10",
      "solr_l", "10",
      "solr_f", "10",
      "solr_d", "10",
      "solr_ti", "10",
      "solr_tl", "10",
      "solr_tf", "10",
      "solr_td", "10",
      "solr_pi", "10",
      "solr_pl", "10",
      "solr_pf", "10",
      "solr_pd", "10",
      "solr_dt", "2000-01-01T01:01:01Z",
      "solr_tdt", "2000-01-01T01:01:01Z",
      "solr_pdt", "2000-01-01T01:01:01Z"
    ));
    assertU(commit());

    // test that Luke can handle all of the field types
    assertQ(req("qt","/admin/luke", "id","SOLR1000"));
  }
